abstract.t: This document describes the scenarios, requirements and technologies for IPv6-based Cloud-oriented Networking. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Discussion of this document takes place on the Computing-Aware Traffic Steering Working Group mailing list (cats@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/cats/. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/VMatrix1900/draft-cats-ipv6-based-con.
